title: Medicine & side effects
description: All medicines have possible side effects, but not everybody will experience them. Learn about questions to ask when you are prescribed a new medicine.
cleaned_text: Medicine and side effects Side effects, also called adverse reactions, are the unintended effects of a medicine. All medicines have possible side effects, but not everybody will experience them. When you are recommended a medicine, it's important to ask questions about side effects and what they mean for you.
